poster: J o r d a n s
title: I got myself a problem
body: Well my friends sent me a link and it said league of legends on the link so i thought seems legit cuz free rp who wouldnt want free rp and then i clicked it then it redirected me so i closed it and played a ranked after i won i got logged out but when i was skyping my friends they said noone was on it but when i relogged on someone sent a couple of my friends the same link and during that ranked game too. Also changed email too my account so please help me riot games ive spent crap ton of money on this game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Oh no! That doesn't sound good.

First things first, did you download anything from that site?

Because the email on your account has been changed you'll probably want to run through the [Account Recovery Process](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account).

[Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) with the subject line "Unrecoverable Account" from the email address that you used to sign up for your account. Make sure to provide us with the requested information about the account you are trying to recover. From there we will work with you to verify ownership of the account.
